entry.title: One paper is accepted by NeurIPS 2025 as Spotlight

link.title: One paper is accepted by NeurIPS 2025 as Spotlight

entry.content: Qiangqiang Mao’s work “Differentiable Decision Tree via “ReLU+Argmin” Reformulation” is accepted as Spotlight by Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS).
entry.summary: Qiangqiang Mao’s work “Differentiable Decision Tree via “ReLU+Argmin” Reformulation” is accepted as Spotlight by Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS).

entry.title: Start my PhD program in Chemical and Biological Engineering at UBC

link.title: Start my PhD program in Chemical and Biological Engineering at UBC

entry.content: I start my PhD program in CHBE, UBC!
entry.summary: I start my PhD program in CHBE, UBC!

entry.title: One paper is accepted by _IEEE TSMC: Systems_

link.title: One paper is accepted by _IEEE TSMC: Systems_

entry.content: Multiobjective Dynamic Optimization of Nonlinear Systems With Path Constraints is accepted by IEEE Transactions on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics: Systems. Thanks my supervisor Jun Fu and the coauthors!
entry.summary: Multiobjective Dynamic Optimization of Nonlinear Systems With Path Constraints is accepted by IEEE Transactions on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics: Systems. Thanks my supervisor Jun Fu and the coauthors!
